channel.title: Man Of The Hour
channel.copyright: Copyright 2006-2012 Man Of The Hour/idobi Radio
channel.managingEditor: manofthehour@idobiradio.com (Sébastien Lefebvre, Patrick Langlois, idobi Radio)
channel.webMaster: manofthehour@idobiradio.com (Sébastien Lefebvre, Patrick Langlois, idobi Radio)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Radio show w/ Patrick Langlois and Sebastien Lefebvre
channel.itunes:summary: The Man of the Hour radio show & podcast from idobi Radio is hosted by Simple Plan guitarist, Sebastien Lefebvre, and MusiquePlus journalist, Patrick Langlois. Man of the Hour introduce listeners to new music and allows fans to glimpse into the private lives of the hosts. The show airs every Wednesday at 8pm EST on idobi Radio.
channel.itunes:keywords: sebastien, patrick, simple, plan, musiqueplus, role, model, clothing, idobi, radio, lefebvre, langlois
channel.itunes:author: Sébastien Lefebvre, Patrick Langlois, idobi Radio

item.title: Episode s07e03
item.dc:creator: Tom Cheney
item.description: Season 7, Episode 3. Discovering porn on the internet, broadcasting from Montreal.
item.itunes:subtitle: Season 7, Episode 3. Discovering porn on the internet, broadcasting from Montreal.
item.itunes:summary: Season 7, Episode 3. Discovering porn on the internet, broadcasting from Montreal. Music from Kanye West, The Streets, Steel Panther, and Weezer. Pat and Seb are getting ready for Christmas. Tom is working on the idobi App. Also, Tom my be occasionally lazy, but Patrick use to sleep with guys for free meals. True story.
item.itunes:keywords: Kanye, West, Steel, Panther, The, Streets, Weezer
item.itunes:author: Sébastien Lefebvre, Patrick Langlois, idobi Radio

item.title: Episode s07e02
item.dc:creator: Tom Cheney
item.description: Season 7, Episode 2. It wasn't a dream. Man of the Hour is back on idobi Radio.
item.itunes:subtitle: Season 7, Episode 2. It wasn't a dream. Man of the Hour is back on idobi Radio.
item.itunes:summary: Season 7, Episode 2. It wasn't a dream. Man of the Hour is back on idobi Radio. This week, Patrick talks about wanting Harry Potter to die, and Sébastien talks about wanting to marry Prince William. Also, music by Good Charlotte, Mumford And Sons, Hollerado, and Linkin Park.
item.itunes:keywords: Good, Charlotte, Harry, Potter, Hollerado, Linkin, Park, Mumford, And, Sons, Prince, William
item.itunes:author: Sébastien Lefebvre, Patrick Langlois, idobi Radio
